official_title: A bill to allow certain interest costs to be reimbursable under the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 in the case of grants to victims of the Johnstown flood.

summary.text: Allows reimbursement under the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 of interest costs incurred on loans borrowed, prior to receipt of Federal grants, by victims for disaster relief work resulting from the Johnstown, Pennsylvania, floods of 1977.

titles.title: A bill to allow certain interest costs to be reimbursable under the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 in the case of grants to victims of the Johnstown flood.
